entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wabush Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:19 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -31.2°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 10 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 10 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023
